nodes.text: Leku Lex! was a decorative poster of a green-skinned Twi'lek female posing in a tight, revealing outfit. An Aurebesh caption spelled out the name of the poster. Three years before the Battle of Yavin, it was used to decorate the walls of an AT-TE that served as the home of the clone veterans Rex, Wolffe, and Gregor.

Leku Lex! first appeared in the Star Wars Rebels episode "Relics of the Old Republic", and was first fully shown in its online episode guide. The Twi'lek in the artwork resembles the one painted on the LAAT/i gunship Spaceward Ho!
